name: 2D shooters
description:
2D shooters

My 3rd game. It seems to have turned out fine and I even made localization.

Destroy enemies in 2D or 2D top Down. There are 2 versions for each type. The enemies are getting stronger every time. Random generation of levels in 2D top Down. Collect hearts, shields and find weapons.

Controllers:

W, A, D, S or arrows - control; E - change of weapons; R - end of the game; Left mouse button - shoot.

I hope you like it!
